variable.name: plate_id
variable.comment: Character field Blank = Field not filled in. Non-blank = Field filled in.

variable.name: C2
variable.comment: The lower detectable limit for C2 is 6760000 pg/mL and the upper detectable limit is 27700000000 pg/mL. C2 values below or above these limits were set to the lower or upper detectable limit respectively. Use C2_I to see what records are below and above these limits. C2 values were set to unknown if C2_CV was greater than or equal to 23.4 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1) or 24.2 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: c2_cv
variable.comment: C2_CV values were set to unknown if C2_CV was greater than or equal to 23.4 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1) or 24.2 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: CD14
variable.comment: The lower detectable limit for CD14 is 58200 pg/mL and the upper detectable limit is 239000000 pg/mL. CD14 values below or above these limits were set to the lower or upper detectable limit respectively. Use CD14_I to see what records are below and above these limits. CD14 values were set to unknown if CD14_CV was greater than or equal to 55.8 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1) or 28.9 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: cd14_cv
variable.description: CV for monocyte differentiation antigen CD14
variable.comment: CD14_CV values were set to unknown if CD14_CV was greater than or equal to 55.8 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1) or 28.9 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: ApoB
variable.comment: The lower detectable limit for APOB is 3890000 pg/mL and the upper detectable limit is 15900000000 pg/mL. APOB values below or above these limits were set to the lower or upper detectable limit respectively. Use APOB_I to see what records are below and above these limits. APOB values were set to unknown if APOB_CV was greater than or equal to 27.1 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1) or 34.2 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3). This apolipoprotein B assay is the same as the one done in panel I (dataset name: l_mpimn01_2005_m_0692). This time the dilution was lower so that fewer would be below the detectable limit. This apolipoprotein B variable should be used instead of the APO_B100 variable in the panel I dataset.

variable.name: apob_cv
variable.comment: APOB_CV values were set to unknown if APOB_CV was greater than or equal to 27.1 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1) or 34.2 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: Adipsin
variable.comment: The lower detectable limit for ADIPSIN is 4480 pg/mL and the upper detectable limit is 18300000 pg/mL. ADIPSIN values below or above these limits were set to the lower or upper detectable limit respectively. Use ADIPSIN_I to see what records are below and above these limits. ADIPSIN values were set to unknown if ADIPSIN_CV was greater than or equal to 31.6 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1) or 33.2 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: adipsin_cv
variable.comment: ADIPSIN_CV values were set to unknown if ADIPSIN_CV was greater than or equal to 31.6 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1) or 33.2 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: B2M
variable.comment: The lower detectable limit for B2M is 58500 pg/mL and the upper detectable limit is 240000000 pg/mL. B2M values below or above these limits were set to the lower or upper detectable limit respectively. Use B2M_I to see what records are below and above these limits. B2M values were set to unknown if B2M_CV was greater than or equal to 20.7 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1) or 28.5 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: b2m_cv
variable.comment: B2M_CV values were set to unknown if B2M_CV was greater than or equal to 20.7 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1) or 28.5 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: c2_i
variable.value: Set to missing because CV was above allowable limit

variable.name: cd14_i
variable.description: Indicator variable for monocyte differentiation antigen CD14
variable.value: Set to missing because CV was above allowable limit

variable.name: apob_i
variable.value: Set to missing because CV was above allowable limit

variable.name: adipsin_i
variable.value: Set to missing because CV was above allowable limit

variable.name: b2m_i
variable.value: Set to missing because CV was above allowable limit

variable.name: run_date
variable.comment: Full date is presented in the dataset, month and year are presented in the documentation to preserve confidentiality. Number of days since exam 1.
